title: Patient Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify full Create, Read, Update, Delete operations for patient records ensuring data validation and CPF uniqueness.

steps.description: Create new patient with valid data including unique CPF
Patient creation is successful and record is stored correctly
Fetch patient details by ID
Correct patient data is returned
Update patient record with valid updated data
Patient record is updated correctly
Attempt to create patient with duplicate CPF
System rejects creation and returns validation error for CPF uniqueness
Delete existing patient record
Patient record is deleted and no longer retrievable

title: Appointment Scheduling Conflict Prevention
description: Ensure the scheduling system prevents overlapping appointments and supports recurring appointment series with notifications.

steps.description: Create a single appointment on a time slot
Attempt to create another appointment overlapping the first one
System rejects conflicting appointment creation with appropriate message
Create a recurring appointment series over multiple days
All series appointments are created successfully without conflicts
Check notifications are sent for created appointments
Users receive timely reminder notifications for appointments
Modify an appointment and verify rescheduling notifications
Appropriate notifications for changes are received

title: Clinical Notes Editor Functionalities
description: Verify rich-text formatting, autosave, version history, and template usage in clinical notes editor.

steps.description: Open clinical notes editor and apply rich-text formatting options
Formatting is reflected correctly in the notes
Make typing changes and wait for autosave to trigger
Autosave happens correctly without data loss
Save note multiple times creating different versions
Version history is maintained and accessible
Apply a customizable template to a new clinical note
Template loads correctly and content is editable

title: AI Assistant Report Generation Accuracy
description: Validate AI-generated clinical reports meet at least 95% accuracy and clinical relevance based on input data and notes.

steps.description: Submit patient data and clinical note input to AI report generation endpoint
AI generates report and suggestions with 95% or higher clinical relevance accuracy
Provide incomplete or ambiguous clinical data to AI service
AI handles edge cases gracefully providing meaningful suggestions or error messages

title: Patient Portal Secure Authentication and Data Access
description: Verify patient portal authenticates users securely, enforces access to own data, and restricts unauthorized access.

steps.description: Attempt login with valid patient credentials
Login succeeds with session established
Attempt login with invalid credentials
Login fails with appropriate error
Access patient portal data for logged-in user
Only data of logged-in patient is accessible
Attempt to access another patient's data by URL manipulation or API call
Access is denied with authorization error

title: Reports Generation and Export
description: Ensure users can generate financial and clinical reports with correct data and export them in PDF format.

steps.description: Generate financial report for a specific date range
Report data shows correct revenue, expenses, and profit values
Generate clinical and operational reports via reports dashboard
Reports display accurate and comprehensive data as per selection
Export generated reports to PDF format
PDF exports are generated correctly and include all report content

title: Payment Processing via Multiple Providers
description: Validate payment processing supports multiple providers (Mercado Pago, Stripe, Asaas, PIX) with success confirmation and error handling.

steps.description: Process payment with Mercado Pago provider with valid details
Payment is processed successfully and confirmation received
Process payment with Stripe provider with valid details
Payment is processed successfully and confirmation received
Process payment with Asaas provider with valid details
Payment is processed successfully and confirmation received
Process payment with PIX payment method with valid details
Payment is processed successfully and confirmation received
Attempt payment with invalid payment method or amount
Payment fails with appropriate error and no transaction is recorded

title: Security Features: 2FA and Encrypted Data Transmission
description: Verify multi-role authentication with 2FA setup and login, and confirm data is transmitted encrypted and compliant with LGPD.

steps.description: Set up 2FA for a user account
2FA setup completes and user receives setup confirmation
Perform login with correct credentials and 2FA token
Login is successful and session is created
Verify network traffic during login and data transmissions
All sensitive data is transmitted over encrypted channels (HTTPS/TLS)
Verify system audit logs contain security events including 2FA usage
Audit logs correctly record relevant security events

title: Inventory Management with Alerts and Audit Trails
description: Validate inventory CRUD operations, alert generation for low stock, and proper audit trail recording.

steps.description: Create new inventory item with valid data
Item is created and visible in inventory list
Adjust stock quantity to below alert threshold
System generates low stock alert
Update inventory item details
Audit trail records update operation with timestamp and user
Delete inventory item
Audit trail records deletion operation and item is removed from inventory

title: LGPD Compliance: Data Portability and Deletion Requests
description: Ensure users can request their data portability exports and deletion requests are handled with audit trails.

steps.description: Submit data portability request with valid user identification and format
Request is accepted and data package is generated correctly
Submit request for account deletion
Deletion process is initiated with audit logging
Verify that data is erased per request and no longer accessible
System confirms compliance with LGPD and data is securely removed

title: Task Management Prioritization and Progress Tracking
description: Verify task creation with different priorities, progress updates, and notification triggers function correctly.

steps.description: Create tasks with varying priority levels
Tasks are saved with correct priority and displayed accordingly
Update task progress status
Progress updates reflect immediately
Verify notifications are sent for task deadlines and status changes
Users receive timely and accurate notifications

title: Interactive Body Map Pain Point Marking
description: Test the interactive body map allowing physiotherapists to mark, edit, and save pain points with attributes.

steps.description: Open body map interface for patient
Add multiple pain points with coordinates, intensity, and description
Pain points are displayed correctly on the map
Edit an existing pain point's details
Updates are saved and reflected on the map
Remove a pain point
Pain point is removed and no longer displayed

title: Exercise Library Filtering and Contraindication Alerts
description: Validate exercise library categorization, filtering by specialty and category, media display, and contraindication alerts during prescription.

steps.description: Filter exercises by category and specialty
Exercises returned match filter criteria correctly
Select exercise and verify media (images/videos) display properly
Associated media loads and plays without issues
Prescribe an exercise contraindicated for patient's conditions
System alerts the user of contraindication with visible notification

title: System Performance and Uptime
description: Ensure the system maintains 99.5% uptime and responds to user interactions within 2 seconds under normal and peak loads.

steps.description: Simulate normal user interactions (login, data retrieval, appointment creation)
System responds within 2 seconds for each interaction
Simulate peak load with multiple concurrent users performing typical actions
System maintains responsiveness within 2 seconds and does not crash
Monitor system uptime over continuous 30-day period
Uptime is equal or above 99.5%
